title: Computer Technician
description: This year, I graduated as a Computer Technician, where I first honed my skills as a developer in technologies like Visual Basic and .NET databases like SQLServer

title: UTN FRSN - Superior Technician in Programming
description: This year, I started university in this program, where I've learned everything from the basics of C++ to creating REST APIs with ASP .Net in C# using SQL Server and Frontend with React.

title: Course 'Learn to Program' 2023
description: In this government course, I was able to apply what I learned in university about web design to develop various websites in a different context, which helped me pass the course. I graduated as a 'Junior Web Developer' in June of this year.

title: Course 'I Can Program' - Junior Achievement
description: This course, like the previous one, allowed me to put my frontend knowledge into action by creating websites with vanilla JavaScript. I graduated once again as a 'Junior Web Developer'.

title: Ecommerce for 'Padel Point'
description: This is my first experience in a real-world environment. In this case, I was hired by a client to create an e-commerce platform for their sports product business. I developed the backend of a full-stack project while a colleague handled the frontend. We used essential technologies such as Next.js for the client-side and Nest.js for the backend, along with cloud services like OAuth clients, database deployment, and more.

title: Freelancing with Wordrpess
description: This was my first remote experience working for an international client. I was hired by a startup based in Spain to develop websites as a freelance WordPress developer. Using templates, I built course sales pages, landing pages, and business websites with WooCommerce integration, among others.

title: Codescript | Fullstack developer
description: My first opportunity to be part of a fully remote company. I worked on the backend, developing as a team an application for a logistics company in Mexico. We developed an API with a microservices structure applying Domain Driven Design and CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) with Nest.js, web sockets, RabbitMQ, OpenTelemetry, etc. Using the SCRUM methodology in Azure DevOps.
